startTime.description: Start time. If not specified, the implementation uses the current system time as the default value. Used to schedule a periodic backup

stopTime.description: Stop time. If no stop-time present the event continues indefinitely. Used to schedule a periodic backup

minutes.description: The number of minutes. Used to schedule a periodic backup

hours.description: The number of hours. Used to schedule a periodic backup

days.description: The number of days. Used to schedule a periodic backup

weeks.description: The number of weeks. Used to schedule a periodic backup
